bibl.title: Greek Papyri and Graeco-Latin Hybrid Compounds.

Conclusions. - Pp. 248-252: Appendix: List of Hybrid Compound Forms.
bibl.seg: FILOS Panagiotis, Greek Papyri and Graeco-Latin Hybrid Compounds.
Trevor V. EVANS and Dirk D. OBBINK (Edd.), The Language of the Papyri (Oxford, 2010) pp. 221-252, 5 tabl.

1. Introduction. - 2. Latin loanwords in the Greek papyri. - 3. Latinate compounds in Greek papyri (I): word-formation. - 4. Latinate compounds in Greek papyri (II): semantics. - 5.
